Package server.dao

Class ConversationDao

java.lang.Object
server.dao.ConversationDao
public class ConversationDao extends Object
ConversationDao manages Conversations. Responsible for the CRUD of Conversations.

      Parameters:
      usernames - usernames
      Returns:
      true if created, else false.

    • searchConversationThatIncludeUsername

      public List<Conversation> searchConversationThatIncludeUsername(String username)
      Returns the conversation which among participant a user has the same username as the given username. If no user is found return a empty list.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      Returns:
      a List of conversations, can be empty

    • searchConversationWithId

      Returns the conversation with the corresponding id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id
      Returns:
      the conversation with the corresponding id.
